name: Rock Bottom (FedoraArg)
description:
Rock Bottom is a game of adventure and puzzles in which you will control Josh Swain, a man who will delve into his deepest memories that have haunted him since he was a child.

By immersing yourself in those dreams, you will fight against every scary memory so that you can change your boring routine, at least when you sleep. Hurry up before the floor collapses: you may not fall until you defeat what haunts you!

Credits:

  • Lautaro Fernandez Pricco (@Bursade): Programming
  • Bárbara Cerrudo (@fosf0): Art, Music, SFX, Game Design
  • Angela Haydée Cobos (@Astrid): Art, SFX, Level Design
  • Joaquín León (@Fedora): Programming
